description:
Dashboard for Ubiquiti EdgeRouter Metrics.
Data collection by brontide.

targets.query: SELECT DIFFERENCE(mean("rx_bytes")) AS Download  FROM "Interfaces" WHERE ("router" =~ /^$router$/ AND "ifname" =~ /^$WAN$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)
SELECT DIFFERENCE(mean("rx_bytes")) AS Download  FROM "Interfaces" WHERE ("router" =~ /^$router$/ AND "ifname" =~ /^$WAN$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)
SELECT DIFFERENCE(mean("tx_bytes")) AS Upload  FROM "Interfaces" WHERE ("router" =~ /^$router$/ AND "ifname" =~ /^$WAN$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)
SELECT DIFFERENCE(mean("tx_bytes")) AS Upload  FROM "Interfaces" WHERE ("router" =~ /^$router$/ AND "ifname" =~ /^$WAN$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)
SELECT mean("latency") AS "Latency" FROM "Latency" WHERE ("router" =~ /^$router$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "target" fill(none)

SELECT mean("rx_bytes") AS "Download", mean("tx_bytes") AS "Upload" FROM "Interfaces" WHERE ("router" =~ /^$router$/ AND "ifname" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Users" WITH KEY = "router"
list.label: Router
list.name: router
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Users" WITH KEY = "router"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Interfaces" WITH KEY = "ifname"
list.label: Wan
list.name: WAN
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Interfaces" WITH KEY = "ifname"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Interfaces" WITH KEY = "ifname"
list.label: Interface
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Interfaces" WITH KEY = "ifname"

title: Ubiquiti EdgeRouter
